description.zh-cn: 清末民初政治家，袁世凯的亲信，中国现代警察制度的创始人。曾任中华民国国务总理，后因宋教仁遇刺案嫌疑辞职。
description.en: A politician in the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China, a confidant of Yuan Shikai, and the founder of China's modern police system. He served as Premier of the Republic of China but resigned due to suspicion in the assassination of Song Jiaoren.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初的军事和政治人物，中华民国第一任正式大总统。赵秉钧是其重要亲信。
description.en: A military and political figure in the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China, and the first formal president of the Republic of China. Zhao Bingjun was one of his key confidants.

description.zh-cn: 中国的现代警察制度，由赵秉钧与日本警官合作创制。
description.en: China's modern police system, created by Zhao Bingjun in collaboration with Japanese police officers.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，国民党领袖。1913年3月在上海遇刺身亡。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary and leader of the Kuomintang. He was assassinated in Shanghai in March 1913.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的重要政治和军事人物，曾在赵秉钧辞职后代理国务总理。
description.en: An important political and military figure during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as acting Premier after Zhao Bingjun's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 一种急性脑血管疾病，是导致赵秉钧死亡的原因。
description.en: An acute cerebrovascular disease that was the cause of Zhao Bingjun's death.

description.zh-cn: 清代河南的一个直隶州，是赵秉钧的出生地。
description.en: A sub-prefecture in Henan during the Qing Dynasty, and the birthplace of Zhao Bingjun.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年重臣，洋务派代表人物，楚军的领导者。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing dynasty, a representative of the Self-Strengthening Movement, and the leader of the Chu Army.

description.zh-cn: 由左宗棠领导的清末地方军队，赵秉钧曾于1878年加入。
description.en: A regional army of the late Qing Dynasty led by Zuo Zongtang, which Zhao Bingjun joined in 1878.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年重臣，洋务运动的主要领导人之一。赵秉钧曾在其手下任职。
description.en: A prominent statesman of the late Qing dynasty and one of the main leaders of the Self-Strengthening Movement. Zhao Bingjun served under him.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年设立的中央警察事务主管机构，赵秉钧曾任右侍郎并掌握实权。
description.en: The central police affairs authority established in the late Qing Dynasty, where Zhao Bingjun served as Right Vice Minister and held real power.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末代内阁，由袁世凯组建，赵秉钧在其中担任民政部大臣。
description.en: The last cabinet of the Qing Dynasty, formed by Yuan Shikai, in which Zhao Bingjun served as Minister of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 清末新政设立的中央机构之一，主管民政事务。
description.en: One of the central agencies established during the New Policies of the late Qing Dynasty, responsible for civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第一届内阁，赵秉钧在其中担任内务总长。
description.en: The first cabinet of the Republic of China, in which Zhao Bingjun served as Minister of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第一任内阁总理，后因赵秉钧奉袁世凯之命发起的反唐运动而被迫辞职。
description.en: The first Premier of the Republic of China, who was forced to resign due to the anti-Tang movement initiated by Zhao Bingjun under Yuan Shikai's orders.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋政府时期的外交家和政治家，曾任国务总理。
description.en: A diplomat and politician during the Beiyang Government period of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧是袁世凯的亲信，在其提拔下掌握警政实权，并在袁世凯内阁中任职。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun was a confidant of Yuan Shikai. Under Yuan's promotion, he gained control of police administration and served in Yuan's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯多次推荐和提拔赵秉钧，使其先后担任知府、巡警部右侍郎等职，并掌握警政实权。
description.en: Yuan Shikai repeatedly recommended and promoted Zhao Bingjun, enabling him to hold positions such as Prefect and Right Vice Minister of the Ministry of Police, and to control police administration.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧与驻中国的日本警官合力创制了中国近代警察制度，被誉为创始人。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun, in collaboration with Japanese police officers in China, created China's modern police system and is regarded as its founder.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧被指秘密策划了暗杀宋教仁的计划，遭到舆论抨击，被迫辞去国务总理职务。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun was accused of masterminding the assassination of Song Jiaoren, faced public criticism, and was forced to resign from his position as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 在宋教仁遇刺案中，赵秉钧被指控为幕后策划者。
description.en: In the assassination of Song Jiaoren, Zhao Bingjun was accused of being the mastermind.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧辞去国务总理后，由段祺瑞代理其职务。
description.en: After Zhao Bingjun resigned as Premier, Duan Qirui took over as acting Premier.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧在天津的直隶都督署因中风病逝。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun died of a stroke at the Governor's Office in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 楚军由左宗棠领导。
description.en: The Chu Army was led by Zuo Zongtang.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧在1900年参与镇压义和团。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun participated in the suppression of the Boxer Rebellion in 1900.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧曾在直隷总督李鸿章手下补用为知州。
description.en: Zhao Bingjun served as a prefect under the Governor-General of Zhili, Li Hongzhang.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命的爆发导致清政府重新启用袁世凯，并组建了袁世凯内阁。
description.en: The outbreak of the Xinhai Revolution led the Qing government to reappoint Yuan Shikai and form the Yuan Shikai Cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 赵秉钧奉袁世凯之命开展反唐运动，导致唐绍仪被迫辞去总理职务。
description.en: Under Yuan Shikai's orders, Zhao Bingjun launched an anti-Tang movement, which forced Tang Shaoyi to resign as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 陆征祥因遭到中华民国临时参议院的弹劾而被迫辞职。
description.en: Lu Zhengxiang was forced to resign after being impeached by the Provisional Senate of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1915年12月袁世凯称帝后，追赠赵秉钧为一等忠襄公。
description.en: After Yuan Shikai declared himself emperor in December 1915, he posthumously honored Zhao Bingjun with the title of First-Class Duke Zhongxiang.
